name.en: Chair of Colloidal and Environmental Chemistry

structural_unit_name.en: Chair of Colloidal and Environmental Chemistry

description.en: Course of environmental chemistry is focused on chemical and physical processes in the environment, also distribution of pollutants between different compartments of environment. Special attention will be paid to the phase interactions between air, water and soil, microbial redox processes in the environment and criteria of biodegradation processes of different pollutants. Environmental chemistry course will give an outline of pollution problems and integrated processes in the environment.
description.et: Keskkonnakeemia kursuses käsitletakse ümbritsevas keskkonnas toimuvaid keemilisi ja füüsikalisi protsesse ning vastastoimeid keskkonnas. Samuti käsitletakse õhus, vees ja pinnases toimuvate biokeemiliste protsesside iseloomu, saasteainete levikut ja sellest tulenevaid keskkonnaprobleeme. Keskkonnas toimuvate keemiliste protsesside käsitlemisel pööratakse erilist tähelepanu mikroorganismide vahendusel kulgevatele redoksprotsessidele, saasteainete biolagundatavuse kriteeriumide määramisele ning keskkonna tingimuste hindamisele, et mõista keskkonnas toimuvate integratiivsete protsesside olemust.

objectives.en: To give an overview of basic chemical processes in the environment and to introduce problems in the field of air, soil and water pollution.
objectives.et: Anda ülevaade keskkonnas toimuvatest keemilistest protsessidest ja tutvustada saasteainete leviku probleeme vees, õhus ja pinnases.

learning_outcomes.en: Student who has completed the course:
* understands the cycles of matter, in particular the carbon and nitrogen cycle, and the effects of carbon dioxide dissolution on the aquatic environment;
learning_outcomes.et: * mõistab aineringeid, täpsemalt süsiniku ja lämmastiku ringet, ja süsihappegaasi lahustumise mõju vesikeskkonnale;

learning_outcomes.en: * knows the composition of air and the dissolution of gases in water;
learning_outcomes.et: * teab õhu koostist ning gaaside lahustumist vees;

learning_outcomes.en: * understands chemical equilibrium, alkalinity, dissolution and redox processes, and biodegradation;
learning_outcomes.et: * mõistab keemilist tasakaalu, leelisust, lahustumis- ja redoksprotsesse ning biolagunemist;

learning_outcomes.en: *calculates the concentrations, alkalinity and solubility of substances;
learning_outcomes.et: * arvutab ainete sisaldusi, leelisust ja lahustuvust;

learning_outcomes.en: * evaluates the biodegradability of substances on the basis of complex indicators.
In addition, the student participates in discussions, expresses himself or herself orally and in writing, thinks creatively and practices time planning.
learning_outcomes.et: Lisaks üliõpilane osaleb diskussioonides, väljendab end erialaselt suuliselt ja kirjalikult, mõtleb loovalt ja harjutab ajaplaneerimist.

description.et:
Written test in Moodle: 3 short q about concepts and 3 q that need explanation (Why?); 1 q of "Describe and discuss", 1 q of "Is it true? ", one assignment on chemical reactions, 2 calculation exercises.
Single entry, time-limit 2h. Optionally, an oral discussion would continue.

debt_elimination.et: Individuaalne kokkulepe õppejõuga, järeleksam. Individual agreement with the lecturer, follow-up exam.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

resources.recommended_materials: 1. Manahan S.E., Environmental Chemistry, Lewis Publ., 10th Ed
